verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son לְחָכְמָתִ֣י <S%H2451><s%> unto my wisdom הַקְשִׁ֑יבָה <S%H7181><s%> attend לִ֝תְבוּנָתִ֗י <S%H8394><s%> to my understanding הַט־ <S%H5186><s%> [and] bow אָזְנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H241><s%> thine ear
לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> That thou mayest regard מְזִמּ֑וֹת <S%H4209><s%> discretion וְ֝דַ֗עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge שְׂפָתֶ֥יךָ <S%H8193><s%> and [that] thy lips יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H5341><s%> may keep

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נֹ֣פֶת <S%H5317><s%> [as] an honeycomb תִּ֭טֹּפְנָה <S%H5197><s%> drop שִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> For the lips זָרָ֑ה <S%H2114><s%> of a strange woman וְחָלָ֖ק <S%H2509><s%> [is] smoother מִשֶּׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> than oil חִכָּֽהּ׃ <S%H2441><s%> and her mouth

וְֽ֭אַחֲרִיתָהּ <S%H319><s%> But her end מָרָ֣ה <S%H4751><s%> is bitter כַֽלַּעֲנָ֑ה <S%H3939><s%> as wormwood חַ֝דָּ֗ה <S%H2299><s%> sharp כְּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword פִּיּֽוֹת׃ <S%H6310><s%> as a twoedged
רַ֭גְלֶיהָ <S%H7272><s%> Her feet יֹרְד֣וֹת <S%H3381><s%> go down מָ֑וֶת <S%H4194><s%> to death שְׁ֝א֗וֹל <S%H7585><s%> on hell צְעָדֶ֥יהָ <S%H6806><s%> her steps יִתְמֹֽכוּ׃ <S%H8551><s%> take hold

אֹ֣רַח <S%H734><s%> the path חַ֭יִּים <S%H2416><s%> of life פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> does not תְּפַלֵּ֑ס <S%H6424><s%> Lest thou shouldest ponder נָע֥וּ <S%H5128><s%> are moveable מַ֝עְגְּלֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H4570><s%> her ways לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not תֵדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> [that] thou canst not know פ

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now בָ֭נִים <S%H1121><s%> me now therefore O ye children שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear לִ֑י וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּ֝ס֗וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> and depart מֵאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> not from the words פִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> of my mouth

הַרְחֵ֣ק <S%H7368><s%> far מֵעָלֶ֣יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and דַרְכֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1870><s%> thy way וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֝קְרַ֗ב <S%H7126><s%> from her and come not nigh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> the door בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H1004><s%> of her house

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Lest thou give לַאֲחֵרִ֣ים <S%H312><s%> unto others הוֹדֶ֑ךָ <S%H1935><s%> thine honour וּ֝שְׁנֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H8141><s%> and thy years לְאַכְזָרִֽי׃ <S%H394><s%> unto the cruel

פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> lest יִשְׂבְּע֣וּ <S%H7646><s%> be filled זָרִ֣ים <S%H2114><s%> Lest strangers כֹּחֶ֑ךָ <S%H3581><s%> with thy wealth וַ֝עֲצָבֶ֗יךָ <S%H6089><s%> and thy labours בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [be] in the house נָכְרִֽי׃ <S%H5237><s%> of a stranger

וְנָהַמְתָּ֥ <S%H5098><s%> And thou mourn בְאַחֲרִיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H319><s%> at the last בִּכְל֥וֹת <S%H3615><s%> are consumed בְּ֝שָׂרְךָ֗ <S%H1320><s%> when thy flesh וּשְׁאֵרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7607><s%> and thy body

וְֽאָמַרְתָּ֗ <S%H559><s%> And say אֵ֭יךְ <S%H349><s%> How שָׂנֵ֣אתִי <S%H8130><s%> How have I hated מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> instruction וְ֝תוֹכַ֗חַת <S%H8433><s%> reproof נָאַ֥ץ <S%H5006><s%> despised לִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> and my heart

וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor שָׁ֭מַעְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> And have not obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice מוֹרָ֑י <S%H3384><s%> of my teachers וְ֝לִֽמְלַמְּדַ֗י <S%H3925><s%> to them that instructed לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor הִטִּ֥יתִי <S%H5186><s%> nor inclined אָזְנִֽי׃ <S%H241><s%> mine ear

כִּ֭מְעַט <S%H4592><s%> I was almost הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> utter רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> in all evil בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst קָהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation וְעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> and assembly

שְׁתֵה־ <S%H8354><s%> Drink מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters מִבּוֹרֶ֑ךָ <S%H953><s%> out of thine own cistern וְ֝נֹזְלִ֗ים <S%H5140><s%> and running waters מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of בְּאֵרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H875><s%> thine own well

יָפ֣וּצוּ <S%H6327><s%> be dispersed מַעְיְנֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H4599><s%> Let thy fountains ח֑וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> abroad בָּ֝רְחֹב֗וֹת <S%H7339><s%> in the streets פַּלְגֵי־ <S%H6388><s%> [and] rivers מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> of waters
יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֥ לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H905><s%> alone וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> else לְזָרִ֣ים <S%H2114><s%> Let them be only thine own and not strangers' אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> Let מְקוֹרְךָ֥ <S%H4726><s%> Let thy fountain בָר֑וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> be blessed וּ֝שְׂמַ֗ח <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice מֵאֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> with the wife נְעוּרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5271><s%> of thy youth

אַיֶּ֥לֶת <S%H365><s%> hind אֲהָבִ֗ים <S%H158><s%> [Let her be as] the loving וְֽיַעֲלַ֫ת־ <S%H3280><s%> roe חֵ֥ן <S%H2580><s%> and pleasant דַּ֭דֶּיהָ <S%H1717><s%> let her breasts יְרַוֻּ֣ךָ <S%H7301><s%> satisfy בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵ֑ת <S%H6256><s%> thee at all times בְּ֝אַהֲבָתָ֗הּ <S%H160><s%> with her love תִּשְׁגֶּ֥ה <S%H7686><s%> and be thou ravished תָמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> always

וְלָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why תִשְׁגֶּ֣ה <S%H7686><s%> be ravished בְנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And why wilt thou my son בְזָרָ֑ה <S%H2114><s%> with a strange woman וּ֝תְחַבֵּ֗ק <S%H2263><s%> and embrace חֵ֣ק <S%H2436><s%> the bosom נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5237><s%> alien

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נֹ֨כַח ׀ <S%H5227><s%> [are] before עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God דַּרְכֵי־ <S%H1870><s%> For the ways אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of man וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעְגְּלֹתָ֥יו <S%H4570><s%> all his goings מְפַלֵּֽס׃ <S%H6424><s%> and he pondereth

עַֽווֹנוֹתָ֗יו <S%H5771><s%> His own iniquities יִלְכְּדֻנ֥וֹ <S%H3920><s%> shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked וּבְחַבְלֵ֥י <S%H8551><s%> himself and he shall be holden חַ֝טָּאת֗וֹ <S%H2403><s%> of his sins יִתָּמֵֽךְ׃ <S%H2256><s%> with the cords

ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יָ֭מוּת <S%H4191><s%> He shall die בְּאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> lack מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> without instruction וּבְרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> and in the greatness אִוַּלְתּ֣וֹ <S%H200><s%> of his folly יִשְׁגֶּֽה׃ <S%H7686><s%> he shall go astray פ
